data.name: TextTableRow
desc: specifies the properties of a text table row.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.4

types.name: RowInteropGrabBag
desc: Grab bag of row properties, used as a string-any map for interop purposes.
This property is intentionally not handled by the ODF filter. Any member that should be handled there should be first moved out from this grab bag to a separate property.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.4

types.name: TableColumnSeparators
desc: contains the description of the columns in the table row.

properties.name: BackColor
desc: specifies the color of the background.

properties.name: BackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic of the background.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: BackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the name of the file filter of a background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the position of the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL of a background graphic.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the BackGraphic property.

properties.name: BackTransparent
desc: If TRUE, the background color value in \"BackColor\" is not visible.

properties.name: HasTextChangesOnly
desc: If TRUE, the table row wasn't deleted or inserted with its tracked cell content.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: Height
desc: contains the height of the table row.

properties.name: IsAutoHeight
desc: If the value of this property is TRUE, the height of the table row depends on the content of the table cells.

properties.name: IsSplitAllowed
desc: If TRUE, the row is allowed to be split at page or column breaks.
